title: Bilbo, Well-spoken Gentlehobbit (2U96)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Ally • Home 1 • Hobbit
Strength:	2
Vitality:	3
Site:	1
Game Text:	Fellowship: Exert Bilbo and discard a tale to discard a Shadow condition from an opponent's support area.
Lore:	”…as Mr. Baggins was generous with his money, most people were willing to forgive him his oddities and his good fortune.”
Rarity:	U
Notes:	Card title is an erratum. Image fixed
